title: The future direction of Earth Observation instrumentation in the UK (techUK)
text: ( Source : techUK) The Evaluation The CEOI-ST programme has been funded by the UK Space Agency to develop UK capabilities in future space instrumentation for Earth Observation (EO) through the teaming of scientists and industrialists since
